cardio.additionalNotes: Keep your front knee directly above your ankle. Stretch your arms out to the sides and gaze over your right hand.

nonCardio.additionalNotes: Balance your body weight on one leg. Place the other foot on your inner thigh, and keep your hands in prayer position.
Relax and breathe. This is a good pose to finish your practice.

cardio.additionalNotes: Spread your fingers and toes wide and press firmly through your palms and knuckles. Keep your head between your upper arms, not hanging down.
Stand tall and steady like a mountain. This pose helps to improve posture and balance.
Keep your balance on one foot and press the other foot into your thigh. Keep your hands in the prayer position at your heart center.
Relax your whole body and quiet your mind. This pose is great for deep relaxation.
